videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: How to win with any Chandra on Arena
videos.description:
In the Brawl format, you know what's better than 11 Chandras? 12 Chandras! This deck is led by the new Aetherdrift planeswalker, Chandra, Spark Hunter, and it's a great way to do your daily quests on MTG Arena.

Decklist - https://moxfield.com/decks/q9hN93ubAEO_eN2WDSTc3g
